scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:abtasty && npm run build:react && npm run build:angular && npm run build:vue && npm run build:vue
scripts.build:core: npm run install:core && npm run build-only:core
scripts.release:core: npm run build:core && npm run test:core:dev && npm run test:core:prod && node ./scripts/release/copy.js core
scripts.test:core:dev: npm run express:start && node ./scripts/karma/start.js core dev
scripts.test:core:prod: npm run express:start && node ./scripts/karma/start.js core prod
scripts.build:abtasty: npm run install:abtasty && npm run build-only:abtasty
scripts.release:abtasty: npm run build:abtasty && npm run test:abtasty:dev && npm run test:abtasty:prod && node ./scripts/release/copy.js abtasty
scripts.build:angular: npm run install:angular:8 && npm run build-only:angular
scripts.start:angular:build:ssr: ng build && ng run smart-pixel-angular:server && webpack --config ./scripts/webpack/angular.server.config.js --progress --colors
scripts.test:angular: npm run test:angular:4 && npm run test:angular:5 && npm run test:angular:6 && npm run test:angular:7 && npm run test:angular:8 && npm run test:angular:9 && npm run test:angular:10 && npm run test:angular:11

scripts.test:angular:latest: npm run install:angular:latest && npm run jest:angular:latest

scripts.build:react: npm run install:react:16 && npm run build-only:react
